cookies_link_text.en: updated privacy policy and cookie policy.

cookies_text.en: We use cookies to identify you, thereby enabling us to grant you access to the services and resources provided by the Infrastructure, and also to improve your experience on our site. To find out more, read our

login_help_option1_text.en: Create an EGI SSO account by following this link (it only takes a minute)

login_help_option2_text.en: Ask your IT Support to give users of your institution access to services through eduGAIN, by joining a (national) identity federation that is participating in eduGAIN. Alternatively, your IT Support can request to connect the identity provider of your institution to the EGI service federation as described in the following guide
